top_stories.title: Alibaba Tongyi Lab Releases MAI-UI: A Foundation GUI Agent Family that Surpasses Gemini 2.5 Pro, Seed1.8 and UI-Tars-2 on AndroidWorld
top_stories.description: Alibaba Tongyi Lab have released MAI-UI—a family of foundation GUI agents. It natively integrates MCP tool use, agent user interaction, device–cloud collaboration, and online RL, establishing state-of-the-art results in general GUI grounding and mobile GUI navigation, surpassing Gemini-2.5-Pro, Seed1.8, and UI-Tars-2 on AndroidWorld. The system targets three specific gaps that early GUI agents often ignore, […] The post Alibaba Tongyi Lab Releases MAI-UI: A Foundation GUI Agent Family that...
top_stories.author: Asif Razzaq
top_stories.content: Alibaba Tongyi Lab have released MAI-UI—a family of foundation GUI agents. top_stories.title: Tencent Released Tencent HY-Motion 1.0: A Billion-Parameter Text-to-Motion Model Built on the Diffusion Transformer (DiT) Architecture and Flow Matching
top_stories.description: Tencent Hunyuan’s 3D Digital Human team has released HY-Motion 1.0, an open weight text-to-3D human motion generation family that scales Diffusion Transformer based Flow Matching to 1B parameters in the motion domain. The models turn natural language prompts plus an expected duration into 3D human motion clips on a unified SMPL-H skeleton and are available […] The post Tencent Released Tencent HY-Motion 1.0: A Billion-Parameter Text-to-Motion Model Built on the Diffusion Transformer (DiT)...
top_stories.author: Asif Razzaq

top_stories.title: Inaugural report pioneered by AI Security Institute gives clearest picture yet of capabilities of most advanced AI
top_stories.description: The AI Security Institute's Frontier AI Trends Report, a public assessment of how the most advanced AI systems are evolving, draws on 2 years of testing AI capabilities in areas critical to innovation and security, including cyber, chemistry and biology.
top_stories.content: The AI Security Institute's Frontier AI Trends Report, a public assessment of how the most advanced AI systems are evolving, draws on 2 years of testing AI capabilities in areas critical to innovation and security, including cyber, chemistry and biology.

top_stories.title: Introducing Visa Intelligent Commerce on AWS: Enabling agentic commerce with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore
top_stories.description: In this post, we explore how AWS and Visa are partnering to enable agentic commerce through Visa Intelligent Commerce using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore. We demonstrate how autonomous AI agents can transform fragmented shopping and travel experiences into seamless, end-to-end workflows—from discovery and comparison to secure payment authorization—all driven by natural language.
top_stories.author: Sangeetha Bharath, Seemal Zaman
top_stories.content: In this post, we explore how AWS and Visa are partnering to enable agentic commerce through Visa Intelligent Commerce using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore. We demonstrate how autonomous AI agents can transform fragmented shopping and travel experiences into seamless, end-to-end workflows—from discovery and comparison to secure payment authorization—all driven by natural language.

top_stories.title: Faster agents, bigger blast radius: Why agent governance is the new control plane for resilience
top_stories.description: As enterprises accelerate their move toward autonomous workflows powered by artificial intelligence, the urgent need for robust AI agent governance has become a critical operational mandate. An agent’s potential relies on the fact that they can perform higher-level tasks, including assuming identities and executing business processes. But if that is compromised, attackers have effectively hijacked […] The post Faster agents, bigger blast radius: Why agent governance is the new control plane for...
